clone-commander-wolffe-officer.author: Atomic Mass Games
clone-commander-wolffe-officer.name: Clone Commander Wolffe
clone-commander-wolffe-officer.ability: :squadron: : You may exhaust this card. If you do: Each of up to 3 squadrons that you activate without adept gain assault until the end of its activation. Each squadron that you activate with the *assault* keyword can spend a die with a :hit: or :accuracy: icon to resolve the assault effect. You can spend tokens from this card to ready it.
